rules_text:
[b][Tap up to two target creatures][/b], then put a stun counter on each of them. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
Impetus {2}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for {2}{U}. Then exile it.)[/i]
